org.apache.giraph.metrics

接口 ResetSuperstepMetricsObserver

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BspServiceMaster, BspServiceWorker, ByteCounter, GraphTaskManager, NettyWorkerClient

    public interface ResetSuperstepMetricsObserver
    Observer for users of per-superstep counters. Triggered with calls whenever we are starting a new superstep so that user can re-initialize their metrics.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void newSuperstep(SuperstepMetricsRegistry superstepMetrics)
      Starting a new superstep.

    • 方法详细资料

      • newSuperstep

        void newSuperstep(SuperstepMetricsRegistry superstepMetrics)
        Starting a new superstep. Re-initialize your metrics.
        参数:
        superstepMetrics - SuperstepMetricsRegistry being used.
